Text (Forward|Backward): There is a door to the north.|There is a door to the south leading back to the resting area.
There's daylight shining through the bottom of the north door.|The door to the south leads back to the hallway.
The stairs to the east lead upstairs.|The stairs to the west lead back to the lounge.
The door to the north has been knocked off its hinges. There is nothing but darkness beyond the frame.|The hallway is back to the south.
